channel.title: Lagging source
channel.description:
Friends/my source files... FINE Friends/my client files... FINE Friends/my Enviromental Variables... FINE Friends/my JDK/JRE... FINE
How come still that we have better specs on friends computer and all the same jdk's/jre's it still laggs the client when the source is put on...
EXPLANATION OF LAGG: it freezes for half a second and works like a second then it goes freeze half a second and so on...
Any1 having same problem and knows solution (tried the restart comp already..)

item.title: Lagging source
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Try adding -Xmx700m into run.bat before “server”.

@ECHO OFF title Run. color 0f java[b] -Xmx700m [/b]server pause

If not, you could try temporarily a different client just to see…
If that doesn’t fix it, I suggest cleaning up process(), walking and clicking ingame packets.

Read full topic

item.title: Lagging source
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

Clean up your files or use a different, more stable source.

Read full topic
